channel.title: Making ppl admin and mod in testscape
channel.description:
ok go to your server files at client
then go in client and hold the control button a.k.a ctrl and press f
then seach nvi ible and then replace his name with yours
BTW
3 PLAYER RIGHTS = OWNER\CO-OWNER 2 PLAYER RIGHTS = ADMIN 1 PLAYER RIGHTS = MOD 0 PLAYER RIGHTS = NORMAL PLAYER
hope it helps some people, btw theres sorta a long list of names so you can make quite a few admins.
but i warn you, dont go crazy o.O

item.title: Making ppl admin and mod in testscape
item.dc:creator: @meeped meeped
item.description:
@meeped wrote:

ok go to your server files at client

then go in client and hold the control button a.k.a ctrl and press f

then seach nvi ible and then replace his name with yours

BTW

3 PLAYER RIGHTS = OWNER\CO-OWNER
2 PLAYER RIGHTS = ADMIN
1 PLAYER RIGHTS = MOD
0 PLAYER RIGHTS = NORMAL PLAYER

hope it helps some people, btw theres sorta a long list of names so you can make quite a few admins.

but i warn you, dont go crazy o.O
